mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.member_uuid, p.category_id, c.name AS categoryName, cm.id AS commentId, cm.content AS commentContent, cm.member_uuid AS commentWriterUuid FROM post p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN comment cm ON cm.post_id = p.id WHERE p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cm.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
